OOC: Heh, I got permission to do this... Fun... I also had permission 
to state what the beam would likely do...

IC:
In the atlantic, if one were present they would feel tension in the 
air. Looking down at the ocean they would sea a bright light piercing 
the darkness of its depths as on the bottom the massive cannon built 
at its bottom crackles with energy as it charges, the ground around 
pulsing from the intense energy. At the tip of Greenland, a small 
outpost manned by Hooligan also hums loudly as a large cannon, points 
in the air, its tip glowing with energy. Off the coast of North 
america, a second large cannon exactly like the one in green land 
also hums as Demonite stands by it watching over the cannon. The 
cannon also elevated so its tip poiints into the sky at an angle. 
Finally a short distance away from the alliance base, in the 
infecticon ship the oblivion, the top seconds split open as a third 
cannon, also humming with a large energy ball at its tip rises out of 
it aiming at the sky. The three smaller cannons all are triangulated 
to hit the same point which the Infecticon Fury cannon also shall 
fire at as soon as they do. Inside the mid atlantic base, the 
mysterious robot turns to blight and frostbite, his optics glowing a 
deep red.

????: "Is the satelite and the cannons in posistion?"

Blight: "Yes, we have also locked onto the target."

????: "Excellent, Frostbite, open a open transmission to every 
facility that is on this planet. Our might shall be demonstrated now."

Frostbite nods and soo a transmission is opened to every faction on 
the planet, the dark face of the mysterious bot on display.

????: "Hello... today marks the day in which new lines shall be drawn 
on the battle field. I am offering an alliance to all who wish it, 
they can either ally with us and crush our enemies... or face our 
wrath. To demonstrate our power we are going to fire on a target we 
have selected. I hope to hear from some of you soon over an alliance."

With those words a picture of Maximal city is now shown alongside the 
figures face.

????: "Blight, fire on target.... Now!"

Blight cackles a bit insanely as he presses a red button, immediately 
following that all three large cannons fire a large beam all at the 
smaller dish of the Infecticon sattelite. The dish absorbs the energy 
and glows brightly. A moment later the ocean bubbles and the entire 
Infecticon undersea base shakes violently as the massive cannon 
launched a collosal beam through the ocean and into the sky, the 
entire beam lighting up the sky with a red and blue hue. In space the 
colosal beam spirals and thins and strikes the smaller dish as well, 
and after 2 minutes it also has been absorbed. As soon as it does the 
larged dish swivels and reposistions itself before as a titanic beam 
is fired down nearly blowing the satelite right out of its orbit. 
Above Maximal city the sky gets extremely bright as the beam barrels 
down towards it. A second later the beam strikes the city, engulfing 
it... even if it had shields and they were up, the beam would still 
liekly leave Maximal City just short of being wiped off the map.

OOC: Any chars in there wont be killed unless the players want them 
to be. Although I would expect any survivors to be damage badly.
